text.tspan: Annual COâ‚‚ emissions by world region

Emissions from
fossil fuels and industry
are included, but not land-use change emissions. International aviation
and shipping are included as separate entities, as they are not included in any country's emissions.

g.text: Asia (excl. China and India) Asia (excl. China and India)
